name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Add Board Member
title: Propose adding a board member
description: Create a proposal to add a new board member to a MultiSig wallet. Board members can both propose and sign actions. This proposal requires quorum approval before the member is added.

inputs.name: Board Member Address
inputs.description: The wallet address of the new board member to add.

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The proposal is now awaiting signatures from board members.

label.en: Get notified when this proposal is signed
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to add a new board member
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Hinzufügung eines neuen Vorstandsmitglieds unterzeichnet

label.en: Get notified when quorum is reached
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn das Quorum erreicht ist

body.en: Proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} has reached quorum and is ready to be executed
body.de: Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} hat das Quorum erreicht und ist bereit zur Ausführung
